item.title: An Arm and a Leg: Why ‘The Pitt’ Is Our Fave New Drama
item.description: An emergency room doctor says what the TV show “The Pitt” gets right about hospitals, including why they’re so crowded and the bills so high.

item.title: Journalists Explore Medicaid Work Rules, CDC Layoffs, and RFK Jr.’s ‘MAHA’ Mission
item.description: KFF Health News journalists made the rounds on national or local media recently to discuss topical stories. Here’s a collection of their appearances.

item.title: In Reversal, FDA Rehires Staff Tasked With Releasing Public Records
item.description: At least some workers who process public records in response to Freedom of Information Act requests have been reinstated, agency employees say.
